talk.abstract: The goal of this talk is to showcase how App Engine makes it exciting to prototype back-end services for larger projects. Creating such prototypes helps shape project requirements, develop datastores and improve testing coverage.
talk.description: The goal of this talk is to showcase how App Engine makes it exciting to prototype back-end services for larger projects. Creating such prototypes helps shape project requirements, develop datastores and improve testing coverage.
talk.name: Supercharge web application prototypes with the App Engine Python SDK
talk.title: Supercharge web application prototypes with the App Engine Python SDK
